content: Hi Friends! The January Connectathon is next week! The CDS Hooks track's orientation call will be held this Thurs at noon Central time on this zoom: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/j/97932746535?pwd=cDczdmgzbXdkVnRlaW9YUy9HNXQ0dz09.
Ping me if you'd like a convenient calendar invite to the orientation call sent to your inbox! :calendar: :tada:
